name: NIH - Summer Internship Program in Biomedical Research (SIP)
description: Competitive 8-week summer research program at the National Institutes of Health for high school students. Students work directly with NIH scientists on cutting-edge biomedical research projects. Program includes weekly seminars, poster presentations, and networking opportunities with leading researchers.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Biology, Medicine, Health Sciences, Genetics

name: Stanford Medicine - Summer Research Program for High School Students
description: Intensive 8-week biomedical research program where high school students work in Stanford Medical School laboratories. Students conduct independent research projects under faculty mentorship and present findings at program symposium.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Medicine, Molecular Biology, Neuroscience

name: Jackson Laboratory - Summer Student Program
description: Hands-on genomics and genetics research experience for high school students at premier biomedical research institution. Students work with world-class scientists on projects involving mammalian genetics, cancer biology, and computational biology.
stem_fields: Genetics, Genomics, Cancer Biology, Computational Biology
financial_aid_available: Stipend, housing, and travel assistance provided

name: Mayo Clinic - High School Summer Research Program
description: Prestigious biomedical research internship at Mayo Clinic for motivated high school students. Interns work alongside physician-scientists and researchers on projects in areas like cardiovascular research, oncology, and regenerative medicine.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Medicine, Cardiovascular Science, Oncology

name: Roswell Park Cancer Institute - High School Summer Research Program
description: Cancer research internship for high school students at comprehensive cancer center. Students participate in laboratory research focused on cancer biology, immunology, and treatment development while learning from leading oncology researchers.
stem_fields: Cancer Biology, Immunology, Oncology, Biomedical Research

name: Johns Hopkins School of Medicine - Summer Biomedical Research Program for HS
description: Rigorous 8-week research experience at Johns Hopkins for exceptional high school students. Interns work in medical school laboratories conducting research in areas like neuroscience, genetics, public health, and biomedical engineering.
source: Johns Hopkins University School of Medicine
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Neuroscience, Genetics, Public Health

name: Boston University School of Medicine - RISE Practicum
description: Research internship for underrepresented minority high school students interested in biomedical careers. Six-week program includes laboratory research, clinical shadowing, and career development workshops. Strong focus on diversity in medicine.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Medicine, Clinical Sciences, Health Sciences

name: UC San Francisco - High School Biomedical Research Internship
description: Summer research program at UCSF for Bay Area high school students interested in biomedical sciences. Students conduct hands-on research in laboratories focused on precision medicine, stem cell research, and drug discovery.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Stem Cell Biology, Pharmacology, Medicine

name: Memorial Sloan Kettering - Summer Student Program
description: Cancer research internship for high school students at world-renowned cancer center. Students work on cutting-edge cancer biology projects, attend research seminars, and present findings at end-of-summer symposium.
stem_fields: Cancer Biology, Oncology, Immunotherapy, Biomedical Research

name: Cleveland Clinic - Lerner Research Institute Summer Internship
description: Biomedical research internship for high school students at Cleveland Clinic. Interns participate in research projects in cardiovascular medicine, cancer biology, inflammation, and translational medicine.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Cardiovascular Medicine, Cancer Biology, Immunology

name: MD Anderson Cancer Center - High School Summer Research Program
description: Elite cancer research program for Texas high school students at one of nation's top cancer centers. Students conduct research in cancer prevention, treatment, and biology while learning from world-class oncology researchers.
stem_fields: Cancer Research, Oncology, Molecular Biology, Biomedical Sciences

name: Broad Institute - Summer Research Program for High School Students
description: Genomics and computational biology research internship at MIT/Harvard Broad Institute. High school students work on projects involving genomic medicine, cancer genomics, and data science in biology.
source: Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard
stem_fields: Genomics, Computational Biology, Data Science, Biomedical Research

name: University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine - Summer Research Program
description: Biomedical research internship for local high school students at Pitt Med. Students work in laboratories conducting research in neuroscience, infectious diseases, regenerative medicine, and other biomedical fields.
source: University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Neuroscience, Infectious Disease, Medicine

name: Scripps Research - High School Summer Internship Program
description: Research experience at Scripps Research Institute for high school students. Interns work on projects in chemical biology, drug discovery, immunology, and neuroscience at world-class biomedical research facility.
stem_fields: Chemical Biology, Drug Discovery, Immunology, Neuroscience

name: Weill Cornell Medicine - Summer High School Research Program
description: Biomedical research internship at Weill Cornell Medical College in New York City. Students conduct research in areas including cardiovascular medicine, genetics, neurology, and global health.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Cardiovascular Medicine, Genetics, Neurology

name: Fred Hutchinson Cancer Center - Summer High School Internship
description: Cancer research internship for Pacific Northwest high school students at Fred Hutch. Students work on research projects in cancer biology, immunotherapy, clinical trials, and public health sciences.
stem_fields: Cancer Biology, Immunotherapy, Clinical Research, Public Health

name: Duke University School of Medicine - Summer Research Opportunities
description: Research internship program at Duke Med for North Carolina high school students. Interns work in cutting-edge laboratories on projects spanning genetics, neuroscience, biomedical engineering, and clinical research.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Genetics, Neuroscience, Biomedical Engineering

name: Children's Hospital of Philadelphia - Summer Research Program
description: Pediatric biomedical research internship at CHOP for high school students interested in pediatric medicine and research. Students work on projects related to pediatric diseases, genetics, and developmental biology.
stem_fields: Pediatric Medicine, Biomedical Research, Genetics, Developmental Biology

name: Emory University School of Medicine - SURE Program for HS
description: Summer Undergraduate Research Experience adapted for exceptional high school students at Emory. Students conduct biomedical research in areas like infectious diseases, neuroscience, and health disparities.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Infectious Disease, Neuroscience, Public Health

name: Baylor College of Medicine - High School Summer Science Program
description: Intensive biomedical research program for Houston-area high school students. Interns work in Baylor laboratories on projects in molecular biology, genetics, neuroscience, and translational medicine.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Molecular Biology, Genetics, Neuroscience

name: Washington University School of Medicine - High School Summer Scholars
description: Elite biomedical research program at WashU Med for St. Louis area high school students. Students participate in hands-on research projects in cancer biology, immunology, and molecular medicine.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Cancer Biology, Immunology, Molecular Medicine

name: University of Michigan Medical School - Summer Research Opportunity
description: Biomedical research internship at U-M for Michigan high school students. Interns work in medical school laboratories on diverse projects including stem cell research, neuroscience, and precision medicine.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Stem Cell Biology, Neuroscience, Precision Medicine

name: Nationwide Children's Hospital - Summer Research Internship
description: Pediatric research internship for central Ohio high school students at Nationwide Children's Hospital Research Institute. Students conduct research in pediatric health, genetics, and childhood diseases.
stem_fields: Pediatric Research, Genetics, Childhood Diseases, Health Sciences

name: Columbia University Irving Medical Center - HS Summer Research
description: Biomedical research program at Columbia Medical School for New York area high school students. Interns work alongside faculty on research in genetics, neuroscience, cardiovascular disease, and cancer biology.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Genetics, Neuroscience, Cardiovascular Disease

name: Yale School of Medicine - Summer High School Research Fellowship
description: Prestigious research fellowship at Yale Med for Connecticut high school students. Fellows conduct biomedical research in areas including immunology, genetics, neuroscience, and global health.
stem_fields: Biomedical Research, Immunology, Genetics, Neuroscience
